content: I think I'll create an Instagram Story with a series of segments, starting with a "Before and After" edit, and then sharing some "Gear Talk" about the equipment I used during the workshop. I'll also include a "Top 5 Takeaways" segment, where I'll share the most valuable lessons I learned during the workshop. I might even include a "Sneak Peek" of an upcoming project or photoshoot to keep my audience engaged. What do you think I should use as a hashtag for my Instagram Story?
